title: Space 2: life in the space [BBC][Spa-Eng]
description:
FORMAT: DVD5 Full DVD
SYSTEM: PAL
LANGUAGES: 2.0: Spanish, English
SUBS: Spanish, English
ASPECT RATIO: 4:3

Production Year: 2001 BBC
Country: United Kingdom.
Length: 50 min.
Director: Luke Campbell, Jeremy Turner


We come from the stars. All the elements that shape the Earth and the life that exists in it were formed during the death of an enormous star.

During million years the universe was an enormous mass of hydrogen that was created by the Big Bang. What was then what turned the stars into us? Physicists of the world try to answer this.

What yes we know is that the Earth is the only place of the universe that assembles the suitable conditions for the life. But what does happen in other parts? We go to the search of other signs of life among the stars, study the stellar rubbles that have created new worlds, and wonder constant: are we one in a million? There is intelligent life in other planets?
